body.p: The import/export operations are located in the Options menu. These operations allow you to load or save global preferences as an XML file. You can use this file to reload saved options both on your computer and on others.

The import/export buttons are located in the preferences page of the . To open this page, go to Window Preferences oXygen XML Editor . You can use the import/export buttons to load or save global preferences as an XML file which can be reloaded both on your computer and on others.

ph.ph: The name of the options file of Oxygen XML Editor is oxyOptionsSa.xml.
The name of the options file of Oxygen XML Author is oxyAuthorOptionsSa.xml.
The name of the options file of Oxygen XML Developer is oxyDeveloperOptionsSa.xml.
The name of the options file of Syncro SVN Client is oxyOptionsSvn8.0.xml.
